conditions_step_three_and_four: By signing up, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, including Cookie Use. Twitter may use your contact information, including your email address and phone number for purposes outlined in our Privacy Policy, like keeping your account secure and personalizing our services, including ads. Learn more. Others will be able to find you by email or phone number, when provided, unless you choose otherwise here.
heading_step_four: Track where you see Twitter content across the web
paragraph_step_four: Twitter uses this data to personalize your experience. This web browsing history will never be stored with your name, email, or phone number.
